infos.value: Lordmooont!
Wait...did you just hear...!?
*Gasp* *gasp*
Wh-why are you here!?
*Gasp* *gasp*
Out with it!
*Gasp* *gasp* Laddy Mashley...
Abducted... *Gasp* *gasp* To Lonis Cassle!
I can't understand you! Please, speak clearly.
*Hack* *cough* *wheeze*
Phew...okay... I'm okay now...
A-are you sure?
What's happened?
Well...
Lady Machérie has been taken captive?
I can't believe it... Hourne has fallen into internal dissension.
What's more...Queen Helena and Sir Owe are...
...Yes, I know.
I had hoped against hope that it were not true, but alas...
Lord Mont...
I have to help Machérie...
I understand how you must feel, but we have other duties to attend to.
We cannot leave King Oelde and Schuzelt in King Khury's clutches.
I know that...
For now, let us return to Wezette Castle.
We can ask His Majesty for guidance. Would that be acceptable?
...As you say, Lilyth.
We should speak with Father and decide which nation to align with—Hourne or Wezette...
E-excuse me. How is Schuzelt doing?
He's fine.
What a relief!
The Shield of Hourne himself threatened us. He said that if anything were to befall Schuzelt, it would be on our heads.
You need not worry. He's with Father now, recovering from his injuries at Wezette Castle.
If that's the case, there should be no issue uniting with Hourne.
King Robb said as much. "At present, we ought to join hands with Leonis and fight together as allies."
I see. We wish for that as well.
By the way...who might you be?
I hail from Ovis. Our country has crumbled under Rundall's assault, and I have come seeking your assistance...
She has fought valiantly with us every step of the way. So please...!
Rundall clearly poses a threat to us as well. We will gladly lend you our swords.
But before that...
We have some unwanted company to deal with.
